comment._content:
This is a very special picture from Vøringsfossen waterfall! The most visited waterfalls in Norway in many ways. You drive the famous Måbøvalley and you can visit the waterfall in 30 minutes walk. I would strongly recommend to bring with you a guide to get the dramatic history about the hard way of living here ,the avalanches, roadbuilding and about the Fossli Hotel. Edvard Grieg was here too composing! The surroundings are like Grand Canyon! Waterfall is 182 meeters high! And the bridge is brand new in 2008!
The waterfall is still as beautiful as ever! and you can see the rainbow crossing the waterfall between 5 and 7pm
If you ever come to NOrway, visit it! Welcome to Eidfjord!
You will never forget the place! 
Gunn MArit Lægreid, Eidfjord, Norway!
